abstract: Perella Weinberg Partners has hired Christopher O’Connor, a health care banker at JPMorgan Chase, to help the boutique investment bank build out its medical devices advisory practice.
snippet: Perella Weinberg Partners has hired Christopher O’Connor, a health care banker at JPMorgan Chase, to help the boutique investment bank build out its medical devices advisory practice.
lead_paragraph: Perella Weinberg Partners has hired Christopher O’Connor, a health care banker at JPMorgan Chase, to help it build out its medical devices advisory practice.

headline.main: Perella Weinberg Hires JPMorgan Health Care Banker

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced

abstract: Now that the quiet period for banks involved in the public offering has lifted, the company’s top underwriters, Morgan Stanley, JPMorgan Chase and Citigroup, all initiated coverage on Pandora.
snippet: Now that the quiet period for banks involved in the public offering has lifted, the company’s top underwriters, Morgan Stanley, JPMorgan Chase and Citigroup, all initiated coverage on Pandora.
lead_paragraph: Pandora edged up modestly on Monday, even as analysts gave mixed reviews to the online music service.
